define: Use the API to download the TO label that should be attached to the carton before drop-off at the warehouse (Only for TW channel_id:30029).

error_list.name: logistics.can_not_print_to_label
error_list.description: You do not have permission to call this API because you are either not enabled for channel 30029 or do not have any ongoing orders in this channel.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Sorting Group of the TO. Available value:

1:North

2:South

","name":"sorting_group","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"kRzefGn"},{"description":"

Specifies the TO quantity, up to a maximum of 20 per request. If not specified, the default value is 1

","name":"quantity","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":"False","key":"NAsHKB"}],"response_params":[{"name":"waybill","type":"file","sample":"","description":"

The waybill file.

","key":"SKkQQJY"}]}
